text: Tusya, also called Tusian is a language of Burkina Faso. ==Dialects== There are two dialects. *Tir (North Tusian) *Win (South Tusian) The northern dialect is spoken to the north, east, and south of Orodara. The southern dialect is spoken in and around Toussiana. ==References== Category:Languages of Burkina Faso
title: Tusya language
